sentence.Network_en: Tarlv score, somatosensory evoked potentials ( SEP ), motor evoked potentials ( MEP ) were examined.

sentence.Network_en: AIM : To evaluate the instant effect of naloxone for brain infarction with somatosensory evoked potentials ( SEP ).

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the diagnostic values of somatosensory evoked potential ( SEP ) in spinal cord diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨体感诱发电位 ( SEP ) 在脊髓病变中的诊断价值.
